name: Cubeman Assassin
description:
Introduction:

You play as Bob and Bob is an assassin. Kill attackers, collect their parts, and use them in the shop!

Cubeman Assassin is a top-down shooter style game that is very early in development. I am releasing this demo to see what you guys think!

The Objective:

The objective is to survive for as long as you can. You have completed the demo when you reach Stage 20. Collect parts of the fallen attackers and use them as currency to purchase health replenishment from the shop.

The Controls:

  • W key to move forward, S key to move backwards
  • Use mouse to look around and aim
  • Left mouse button to shoot
  • E key to enter shop

Any feedback would be appreciated, hope you enjoy this early look at the game.

- indieTree Games
